Posts.Content: I had a biopsy after the MRI came back.  <!--StartFragment -->
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?
Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content:
I just got back from my doctor's office. The mammo done last week showed an "increased prominence of a stellate nodule in the right breast". Not sure what that means except that I read that stellate masses often indicate cancer. Can anyone confirm that?
I am having a magnification view tomorrow and also an ultrasound. Will be seeing my Dr. next week when the results come back. I should note here that in the last year I switched doctors and this one is a real gem. She and her nurse practitioner are the best.
Anyway, can anyone shed some light on what a stellate mass is?
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Were you able to do it awake or did they have to put you out?
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: I had my appt. The magnified view showed that the mass is round and appears to be just a calcification. Two radiologists looked at it in the magnified view and both said it was not stellated/spiculated. I have an appt. with the surgeon on Sept. 27th. I suspect that she will tell me then that she can take it out or leave it in. I am inclined to have it removed just to be on the safe side.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: I recently had a mammogram which came back with a macrocalcification in my left breast and microcalcifications in my right breast.  There is no history of breast cancer in my family, but I had a carcinoma insitu of the endometrium when I was 27 (I am 54 now).
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Well, I just hope tomorrow puts some definition into this whole scenario. At this point I don't care how it turns out...just tell me, darnit. I'm ready to deal with whatever it is or isn't. I just need to know and have the waiting over with.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Well, I decided to wait it out and I had my mammogram yesterday.  Won't get any results until sometime next week.  It was surprisingly difficult to wait the 6 months.  I'm not a worrier but my anxiety came out in my dreams.  I began sleepwalking...feeling like I was lost and couldn't find my way back to my bed.  I even ended up sleeping on the floor one night.  But the "waiting anxiety" is now gone and I am just anticipating the results.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the support. I am going out of town for a couple of days and won't have my next appt. with my Dr. until Tuesday morning.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: I did call today and request that they get a second opinion on the films, if they hadn't already, so that it would be on hand for the next appt.  I will keep in touch after that appt.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?
Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content:
I may do that...get a second opinion.  But what I was initially wondering about is...what are 
 causes of microcalcifications?  What percentage of microcalcifations do NOT indicate cancer?
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?
